passives.effects: After casting your ultimate ability, your next 3 basic attacks within 8 seconds gain {{as|50% '''bonus''' attack speed}} and will {{tip|critically strike}} for{{ft|{{as|{{critical damage|50|50}}|critical damage}} '''bonus''' damage.|{{sti|{{as|75% '''total''' critical damage}}}}.}}If an attack would have already critically struck, it instead critically strikes for{{ft|{{as|{{critical damage|100|100}}|critical damage}} '''bonus''' damage|{{sti|{{as|100% '''total''' critical damage}}}}}}and deals {{as|'''bonus''' true damage}} equal to 10% of the triggering {{as|attack's damage}}.
passives.name: Opening Barrage
